Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN RETURN CASE @gender When 1 THEN 'männlich' When 2 THEN 'weiblich' When 3 THEN 'kompliziert' Else 'Unbekannt' END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN begin INSERT INTO [dbo].[AddressToEmployee]([AddressId],[EmployeeId]) VALUES (@AddressId, @EmployeeId) end END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN begin UPDATE [dbo].[Department] SET [CompanyId] = @CompanyId WHERE Id = @DepartmentId end END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[AddressToEmployee]([AddressId], [EmployeeId]) VALUES (@AddressId, @EmployeeId) RETURN @EmployeeId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN begin UPDATE [dbo].[Employee] SET [DepartmentId] = @DepartmentId WHERE Id = @EmployeeId end END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN begin UPDATE [dbo].[Department] SET [EmployeeId] = @ManagerEmployeeId WHERE Id = @DepartmentId end END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN declare @DeleteAddressId int Set @DeleteAddressId = (select Id FROM viAddress WHERE Id = @Id)
if (@DeleteAddressId is not null) begin UPDATE [dbo].[Address] SET [DeleteTime] = GETDATE() WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @DeleteAddressId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN declare @DeleteCompanyId int Set @DeleteCompanyId = (select Id FROM viCompany WHERE Id = @Id) if (@DeleteCompanyId is not null) begin UPDATE [dbo].[Company] SET [DeleteTime] = GETDATE() WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @DeleteCompanyId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN declare @DeleteDepartmentId int Set @DeleteDepartmentId = (select Id FROM viDepartment WHERE Id = @Id)
if (@DeleteDepartmentId is not null) begin UPDATE [dbo].[Department] SET [DeleteTime] = GETDATE() WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @DeleteDepartmentId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN declare @DeleteEmployeeId int Set @DeleteEmployeeId = (select Id FROM viEmployee WHERE Id = @Id)
if (@DeleteEmployeeId is not null) begin UPDATE [dbo].[Employee] SET [DeleteTime] = GETDATE() WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @DeleteEmployeeId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN declare @InsertOrUpdateAddressId int Set @InsertOrUpdateAddressId = (select Id FROM Address WHERE Id = @Id) if (@InsertOrUpdateAddressId is null) begin INSERT INTO [dbo].[Address]([Postcode],[City], [Street],[Country]) VALUES (@postcode, @city, @street, @country) Set @InsertOrUpdateAddressId = @@IDENTITY end else begin UPDATE [dbo].[Address] SET [Postcode] = @postcode, [City] = @city, [Street] = @street, [Country] = @country WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @InsertOrUpdateAddressId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN declare @InsertOrUpdateCompanyId int Set @InsertOrUpdateCompanyId = (select Id FROM Company WHERE Id = @Id) if (@InsertOrUpdateCompanyId is null) begin INSERT INTO [dbo].[Company]([Name]) VALUES (@name) Set @InsertOrUpdateCompanyId = @@IDENTITY end else begin UPDATE [dbo].[Company] SET [Name] = @name WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @InsertOrUpdateCompanyId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN declare @InsertOrUpdateDepartmentId int Set @InsertOrUpdateDepartmentId = (select Id FROM Department WHERE Id = @Id) if (@InsertOrUpdateDepartmentId is null) begin INSERT INTO [dbo].[Department]([Name]) VALUES (@name) Set @InsertOrUpdateDepartmentId = @@IDENTITY end else begin UPDATE [dbo].[Department] SET [Name] = @name WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @InsertOrUpdateDepartmentId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN declare @InsertOrUpdateEmployeeId int Set @InsertOrUpdateEmployeeId = (select Id FROM Company WHERE Id = @Id) if (@InsertOrUpdateEmployeeId is null) begin INSERT INTO [dbo].[Employee]([Name],[Birthdate],[Salery],[Gender]) VALUES (@name, @birthdate, @salery, @gender) Set @InsertOrUpdateEmployeeId = @@IDENTITY end else begin UPDATE [dbo].[Employee] SET [Name] = @name, [Birthdate] = @birthdate, [Salery] = @salery, [Gender] = @gender WHERE Id = @Id end RETURN @InsertOrUpdateEmployeeId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT Id, Postcode, City, Street FROM [Address] WHERE DeleteTime IS NULL

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT Id, Name FROM [Company] where DeleteTime is null

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT c.Id as CompanyId, a.Id as AddressId, Name, Postcode, City, Street FROM [Company] as c LEFT JOIN [Address] as a ON a.CompanyId = c.Id WHERE c.DeleteTime is NULL AND a.DeleteTime is NULL

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT Id, Name FROM [Department] WHERE DeleteTime IS Null

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT Id, Name, Salery, [dbo].[fnGender](Gender) AS Gender FROM [Employee] WHERE DeleteTime IS NULL

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT e.Id as EmployeeId, a.Id as AddressId, Name, Salery, [dbo].[fnGender](Gender) AS Gender, Postcode, City, Street FROM [Employee] as e LEFT JOIN [Address] as a ON e.Id = (SELECT EmployeeId FROM AddressToEmployee) AND a.Id = (SELECT AddressId FROM AddressToEmployee) WHERE e.DeleteTime is NULL AND a.DeleteTime is NULL
